main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object occurred near Waynesville, Ohio on May 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a silvery color, emitted a vibrating sound, and was described as round and slim., Witness estimated the speed of the object to be between 500-600 miles per hour., It was visible for about 10 minutes under clear sky conditions., The object was reported to possibly exhibit unusual behavior such as speeding up and changing direction., The witness noted that there were no photographs or additional evidence captured.
